body: Page 19 has one of the most beautiful panels ive ever seen in a dojuin. 10/10 on art
And this is why gil is the only true king in my books. Also this art is really impressive for something that's 7+ years old

that kiss at the end is what makes this my favourite gilgamesh/artoria doujin. i mean, this doujin is already pretty damn stellar without it but that kiss is like the cherry on top. so cute!!! also i noticed gilgamesh doesn't have his tattoos here (probably because zero doesnt show that form, just his full armour one)

Fate Zero isn't even remotely harem. The MC is married with a kid and all. There are a lot of characters, male and female, but I don't see how that's a problem... But whatever floats your boat man.
